name: sample
description: A simplified fashion application to demonstrate Actito basic features.

scripts.cordova:refresh-plugins: yarn cordova:remove-platforms && yarn cordova:add-android && yarn cordova:add-ios
scripts.cordova:add-android: cordova platform add android; cd platforms/android; gradle wrapper
scripts.cordova:add-ios: cordova platform add ios; cd platforms/ios; pod install

author: Actito
